attributes.action: Demand a Compulsory Drug Test for all MPs. All of HM Forces must pass CDT.
attributes.background: Finding evidence of drug use in the houses of parliament & no police investigation. So one rule for the rest of us & yet those that have been voted into power by the people (Albeit by an incredibly small percentage) get away with it? The results must be posted & those caught sacked. It's only fair.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105070

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
